articles.title: NDC Inspection Group Spokesman Re-clarifies Principled Stand of DPRK
articles.content:
NDC Inspection Group Spokesman Re-clarifies Principled Stand of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the inspection group of the DPRK National Defence Commission issued the following statement on Thursday:
					 One year has passed since warship "Cheonan" sank in the waters off Paekryong Island in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 But the south Korean authorities and military warmongers, hell-bent on the inter-Korean stand-off and steeped in distrust in compatriots,  are still linking the warship "Cheonan" sinking case with the DPRK and passing  the buck for the Yonphyong Island shelling on it, escalating confrontation with it.
					
					 The inspection group of the NDC of the DPRK has already opened to the public the truth of the two cases twice.
					
					 At the outset of the occurrence of the "Cheonan" warship sinking case, the DPRK expressed regret at those who suffered the disaster from the viewpoint that they are members of the Korean nation though they were soldiers of the south Korean army who leveled guns at the DPRK.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities and military warmongers floated investigation results without any scientific ground and objective nature in a bid to deliberately lay obstacles in the way of achieving national reconciliation and unity and block the way of achieving peace and prosperity desired by all the fellow countrymen.
					
					 They have become evermore sinister and brazenfaced in their reckless anti-DPRK confrontation rackets with the first anniversary of the occurrence of the case as a momentum, in particular, only to touch off burning resentment of all the Koreans.
					
					 This situation compelled the inspection group of the NDC of the DPRK to re-clarify its principled stand internally and externally.
					
					1. The south Korean authorities and military warmongers should no longer perpetrate such reckless act as linking the "Cheonan" warship sinking case with the DPRK.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, the DPRK has nothing to do with the case. This means something irrelevant to it can never be anything in which it is allegedly involved no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.
					
					 Any attempt to deliberately link the DPRK with the case while shunning this stark reality would only serve as a living testimony that they are only seeking to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and deteriorate inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south Korean side walked out of the venue of the preliminary contact for opening the north-south high-level military talks without any patience. But it falsified the fact, claiming that the north was the first to walk out of the venue. They should stop such folly at an early date and no longer link the DPRK with the above-said case.
					
					 The further they bedevil inter-Korean relations while spreading the "story about the north's involvement" full of lies and fabrications, the deeper pitfall of history they will find themselves.  
					
					 The inspection group of the NDC will probe the truth about the "farce" by issuing the third and fourth statements till the above-said story has disappeared. 
					
					2. They should no longer work hard to pass the buck for the Yonphyong Island shelling on the DPRK.
					
					Explicitly speaking, the above-said shelling incident was an unsavory case which occurred as they preempted a provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 Had they not preempted firing shells into the inviolable territorial waters of the DPRK, there would not have occurred the shelling on the island.
					
					 Various forms of firing exercises and drills targeted against the DPRK have frequently taken place in the areas of south Korea and waters around it for more than six decades since the division of the country. But the army of the DPRK has not taken any physical counteraction against them even once.
					
					 Any attempt to conceal the criminal preemptive shelling and shift the responsibility for it onto the other is an act of deceiving not only themselves but all the fellow countrymen and an anti-peace act little short of pulling the wool over the eyes of the whole world.
					
					 If they do not want to suffer the same disgrace as they did through the Yonphyong Island shelling incident, they should broad-mindedly halt such shameless act as shifting their blame onto the other and have a proper attitude to settle the issue.
					
					 Their oft-repeated talk about someone's responsibility for the Yonphyong Island shelling would only harden the DPRK's determination to protect the fair and aboveboard extension of the Military Demarcation Line in the West Sea. 
					
					 3. The present south Korean authorities and military warmongers should stop the reckless anti-DPRK hysteria under the pretence of the two cases. 
					
					They are resorting to anti-DPRK confrontation rackets and reckless psychological warfare, anxiously waiting for "contingency" of someone to occur, and staging various forms of military exercises and drills, stoking a war atmosphere. But they should bear in mind that their much anticipated "contingency" is bound to take place in the south, not in the north.  
					
					 Their anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria kicked up by them under the pretexts of the two cases is as foolish an act as shaking fist in the back lane after being hit hard in a street. 
					
					 This is nothing but a thoughtless and traitorous action to calm down the distrust in the two cases shown by different circles of south Korea, settle the ever-growing "discord" in the south, adhere to the nonsensical "theory of principle" in dealing with the inter-Korean relations and stick to the wrong hard-line policy towards the north. 
					
					 The inspection group of the National Defence Commission regards their anti-DPRK confrontation campaign being staged on the lapse of one year since the occurrence of the warship "Cheonan" sinking case as no more than a farce of "counting the age of a dead child". 
					
					 The DPRK wishes more ardently than anyone else to see the tension defused on the Korean Peninsula and achieve peace through the improved relations between the north and the south and this process leading to peace and prosperity of Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 Precisely for this reason the DPRK proposed on its own initiative comprehensive dialogue and negotiations and has made every possible effort of goodwill to put them into practice.
					
					 The reality indicates that the nation is standing at the crossroads of detente and increased tension and peace and prosperity and war. 
					
					 It is the stand of the Korean People's Army to have bold dialogue or fight a real war.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities and puppet military warmongers should properly understand that they are standing on the crossroads of dialogue and war.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets New Czech Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Czech Ambassador 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Dusan Strauch, newly-appointed ambassador of the Czech Republic to the DPRK, Thursday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Vietnamese Defence Minister on Cooperation with KPA
articles.content:
Vietnamese Defence Minister on Cooperation with KPA
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Defence Minister of Vietnam Phung Quang Thanh who is member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam and deputy secretary of the Party Central Military Commission on Mar. 24 met and had a friendly talk with the visiting military delegation of the Korean People's Army.
					 The Vietnamese party, state and army feel grateful and always remember the strong support the Korean party, state and army rendered to the Vietnamese people in the anti-U.S. national salvation struggle, he stressed. 
					
					 President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung provided the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries, he said, adding: We will further develop the exchange and cooperation with the comradely and fraternal KPA.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would surely build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Mongolian Presidential Envoy Wraps up DPRK Visit
articles.content:
Mongolian Presidential Envoy Wraps up DPRK Visit
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- L. Purevsuren, foreign policy advisor to the president of Mongolia who is presidential envoy, and his party flew back on Thursday.
					 During their stay they visited Mangyongdae, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute, the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute and other places.

articles.title: Trade Union Delegation of DPRK Leaves for Greece
articles.content:
Trade Union Delegation of DPRK Leaves for Greece
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea led by Choe Han Chun, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Federation, left here by train on Thursday to attend the 16th Congress of the World Federation of Trade Unions to be held in Athens.

articles.title: Pyongyang College of Agriculture
articles.content:
Pyongyang College of Agriculture 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang College of Agriculture attached to Kim Il Sung University greeted its 30th birthday.
					 It was founded on March 28, Juche 70 (1981) on the motion of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He underscored the need to found the college for the development of the country's agricultural science and technology, chose the site of the college and took measures for building it as quickly as possible.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il has guided the college to train many agricultural experts by improving the contents of education and intensifying scientific researches to suit the developing situation.
					
					 He sent modern experimental apparatuses and other teaching tools to the college on several occasions to consolidate its material and technical foundations.
					
					 The college had only some twenty teachers when it was founded. But now it has several departments, laboratories, a doctoral institute and a research institute.
					
					 Some of its graduates became winners of the titles of People's Scientist and Merited Scientist, professors and doctors for their contribution to the agricultural development of the country.

articles.title: High-Speed Tunneling at Coal Mines
articles.content:
High-Speed Tunneling at Coal Mines 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Coal mines in the DPRK have directed primary efforts to high-speed tunneling.
					 Through high-speed tunneling some 100 cutting faces have been prepared in the first three months of the year. 
					
					 The Hyongbong, Tokchon and other coal mines belonging to the Tokchon Area Coal Mining Complex have topped their first quarterly target. 
					
					 The Jenam Coal Mine developed a coal bed with a deposit of much more than one million tons.
					
					 The Namdok and Inpho coal mines under the Pukchang Area Coal Mining Complex are surpassing their daily tunneling quotas by employing a rational blasting method.
					
					 Coal mines in Sunchon, Anju, Kangdong and Onsong areas have boosted coal output by keeping tunneling ahead of cutting.

articles.title: New Sapling Cultivation Method
articles.content:
New Sapling Cultivation Method
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Nurseries in the DPRK have introduced a new method of sapling cultivation by a rotary spray system.
					 The method makes it possible to cultivate saplings in an intensive way in a limited area. It provides favorable conditions of temperature, sunshine and humidity in the open air.
					
					 It economizes seeds, land and manpower, lowers the production cost and raises the rate of rooting.
					
					 The rotary spray system consists of tube, motor, nozzle and water tank.
					
					 The system is applicable to round-shaped cultivation plots with drainage canals.

articles.title: Korean Embroidery with Long Tradition
articles.content:
Korean Embroidery with Long Tradition
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Old embroideries handed down in Korea as cultural assets reflect the Korean women's wisdom and resourcefulness.
					 The embroidery tradition of the country began in ancient times along with the development of the weaving technology.
					
					 Korean women embroidered formal and wedding dresses, pillow ends and quilt wrapper with flowers, birds, landscape and animals. 
					
					 Embroidery became diverse in shape in the periods of Koryo kingdom and Ri Dynasty.
					
					 Typical embroidered articles made in Pyongyang in the period of the Ri Dynasty are cap, window curtain and folding screen.
					
					 Caps and curtains were embroidered with peony flower, butterfly, bird and letters meaning fortune.
					
					 The patterns are still used in embroidery.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed 
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Thursday dedicates an article to the 29th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's publication of his work "On the Juche Idea".
					 The work comprehensively deals with various issues ranging from the founding of the Juche idea to the philosophical principle, socio-historical principle, the guiding principle of Juche and its historic significance, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea as the guiding idea for accomplishing the socialist cause in the present era by comprehensively systematizing it. This is the ideological and theoretical feat to be specially recorded in the history of the socialist movement. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il scientifically systematized the revolutionary idea, Juche idea which was founded and had been invariably adhered to by the President in the whole course of the revolution and construction. Thanks to his ideological and theoretical exploit the issue of putting the ideological foundation of Korean-style socialism on a new scientific basis and consolidating and developing it found the most successful solution.
					
					 Our country is now waging a dynamic general offensive for building a thriving nation with the high dignity and authority of being a politico-ideological and military power because it has adhered to the Juche idea as a great banner of victory.
					
					 The tremendous vitality of the Juche idea finds its manifestation in that the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people around Kim Jong Il has grown stronger than ever before and the Korean people are waging the general offensive by displaying mental power based on the strong spirit of national self-esteem.
					
					 It also finds an expression in that they are firmly defending socialism, while frustrating the imperialists' vicious ideological and cultural poisoning against socialism. 
					
					 The Juche idea which Kim Jong Il has developed to be a powerful ideological weapon for building socialism serves as an invariable banner in the life and struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK for its truth and invincibility, concludes the article.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper on Wrongdoing of Gov't Officials
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper on Wrongdoing of Gov't Officials
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- In south Korea high-ranking officials have been working hard to build their wealth, according to Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea on March 28.
					 Some time ago there was a campaign of opening their property status to public. This shows that 70 percent of the officials increased their wealth by a large margin as against last year.
					
					 In particular, 89 percent of the officials of secretary and above level at Chongwadae snowballed their property. The average amount increased per each of them totals to 184.3 million won in south Korean currency.
					
					 The majority of office-holders have several apartment houses. They are getting hell-bent on increasing their wealth through speculation on real estate and raising profits through stock dealings. 
					
					 The wife of Won Se Hun, director of the Intelligence Service, holds stocks worth over 200 million won. Meanwhile, it was recently disclosed that the wife of Lee Myung Bak has kept a deposit savings of over 200 million won.
					
					 Such wrongdoings are attributable to the present "government's" policy for the rich, the paper said, adding that nobody will show trust in those dirty officials.

articles.title: Authorities' Reckless Investigation Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Reckless Investigation Slammed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea in a commentary slashed at the authorities for their reckless investigation.
					 It was disclosed on March 25 by media that the Defence Security Command conducted an investigation in secret after taking over the list of members of the economic academic organization of university students from the Police Agency, the commentary noted.
					
					 In particular, the command is seeking to charge the former chairman of the organization with another offense while calling to task his past activities including involvement in the protest against the U.S. beef import, it pointed out.
					
					 The commentary demanded a prompt halt to the coercive investigation by the command reminding one of the period of the military dictatorial regime.

articles.title: Authorities' Illegal Action Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Illegal Action Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and other civic and public organizations in south Korea denounced the authorities for resuming the trial of the headquarters case on Monday.
					 In a press conference called by them outside the building of the Seoul Central District Court, speakers pointed out that the court resumed the trial of the case that day.
					
					 The trial suspended in late November 2009 when an illegal wiretapping by the Intelligence Service under the "law on protection of communication information" was disclosed during trial of members of the headquarters, they noted.
					
					 Later, the constitutional court made a ruling that the law is in contravention of the constitution and counseled its amendment. Nevertheless, the district court resumed the trial for no ground, they charged.

articles.title: Innocent Inhabitant Punished in S. Korea
articles.content:
Innocent Inhabitant Punished in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The prosecution of south Korea Monday demanded five years' imprisonment for an inhabitant, who praised the DPRK, on the charge of violation of the "National Security Law", according to south Korea's Yonhap News. 
					 In the final trial at the Suwon District Court that day, the prosecution branded as "enemy-benefiting deed" the fact that the inhabitant posted an article analyzing the Yonphyong Island shelling incident on Internet website. 
					
					 In June 2010 he was sentenced to one year in prison with a two-year stay of execution on the charge that he posted an article praising the DPRK on Internet website.

articles.title: Earthquake Occurs in S. Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Occurs in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Earthquake of magnitude 3.2 occurred in waters over 50 km away east of Phohang, North Kyongsang Province on Monday, according to KBS of south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy on Mar. 23 issued a bulletin titled "Great Man of Century" with a photograph of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The bulletin in an article said that Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, is a great man who paved the era of independence. 
					
					 Korea, once a backward colonial semi-feudal state, was turned into a developed socialist state by him, the article said, adding:
					
					 The President devoted all his life to the people's happiness.
					
					 He built in Korea a people-centered socialist system in which the people are the master of everything and everything serves them. 
					
					 He continued his field guidance to every nook and corner of the country even at his advanced age of 80 to provide the people with a happy life.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Papers Laud Kim Il Sung's Feats
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Papers Laud Kim Il Sung's Feats
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi papers carried articles to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 In an article titled "Popular Leader" on March 24 Ekota said that the President was a genuine popular leader.
					
					 With the idea of "The people are my God" he gave full play to the inexhaustible strength of the people with due care and thus built the country into a socialist powerful state independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, it noted.
					
					 Natun Katha in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, Eternal President" on March 22 said that Kim Il Sung is the father of socialist Korea which is now displaying its dignity as a politico-ideological, military, scientific and technological giant in the international community.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il is creditably carrying forward the idea and cause of the President, the article noted.

articles.title: Events Held Abroad to Commemorate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Events Held Abroad to Commemorate Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries between March 17 and 24 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 There were a lecture in Democratic Congo and film shows in Russia.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Democratic Congo, said in the lecture:
					
					 The President was the peerlessly great man possessed of rare ideo-theoretical wisdom, distinguished leadership ability and noble popular traits none of other leaders in the world can match.
					
					 He was the savior of the Korean nation's destiny, the father of socialist Korea, the great teacher and the sun of the progressive mankind in the 20th century. 
					
					 Korean films shown included "Korea Shining with Long History". 
					
					After watching a film, the director of the Neutron Physical Field Station of the Dubna International United Nuclear Institute of Russia said: I came to know better about the efforts of Kim Il Sung, who devoted his whole life to providing the people with better conditions for culture and rest, and General Secretary Kim Jong Il's politics of love for the people.
					
					 The socialist system of the DPRK led by Kim Jong Il is excellent and the Koreans living in the system are a happy people, he said.

articles.title: Warm Compatriotism and Friendship Shown in Quake-hit Areas of Japan
articles.content:
Warm Compatriotism and Friendship Shown in Quake-hit Areas of Japan 
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Warm compatriotism is being fully displayed among Koreans and friendship between them and Japanese in the earthquake-stricken areas alive with the work to eradicate the aftermath of the killer quake and ensuing tsunami which rocked Japan, according to Choson Sinbo, the organ of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Central Standing Committee of Chongryon has conducted energetic activities to rescue Koreans and protect their properties, displaying the might of the unity of its organizations.
					
					 Right after the occurrence of the massive quake Chongryon lost no time to form an emergency measure committee and organize rescue teams. They were sent to the quake-hit areas along with relief materials. It has also rendered sincere help not only to the Korean sufferers but to disaster-stricken Japanese out of humanitarianism. 
					
					 Chongryon decided to conduct rescue operations for disaster-hit Koreans under Chongryon and those under the south Korean Residents Association in Japan (Mindan) and Koreans not affiliated to any of these organizations and the work to restore the damaged Korean schools as a movement involving all its organizations and all compatriots and has pushed forward the work to send relief materials to the afflicted areas.
					
					 The above-said rescue teams rushed to the disaster-stricken areas with truck loads of foodstuff, medical supplies, daily necessities and other goods. They were organized by the Headquarters of Chongryon and the organizations of various levels under it to rescue the Koreans in the areas.
					
					 The members of the measure committee are busy with operations to help the quake-hit compatriots. They visited various schools and their houses in Ibaraki, Miyagi, Iwate and Fukushima.
					
					 The members of the Taito Regional Commercial Association in Tokyo Metropolis and the Taito Branch of the Korean Youth League in Tokyo Metropolis handed over 800 garments donated by a Korean businessman to Koreans in the disaster-hit area. 
					
					 The representatives of the Korean Youth League in Japan, the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan and the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan visited the Fukushima Korean senior high school and the Tohoku Korean senior high school to convey a large quantity of medical supplies and other materials to the Koreans and Japanese who took shelter there. 
					
					 Upon its arrival on the spot, Chongryon's medical team provided brisk medical care, taking health checks for the Koreans sheltering in a school hostel.
					
					 Choe Sun Chang said: "Our compatriots have always taken sincere care of us, considering our pain as their own. This encouragement is leading to the single-minded unity of all of us and this has become a source of strength of compatriots and members of the Korean Youth League in Tohoku." 
					
					 Ri Jong Sun, advisor to the Chuo Branch of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, was not able to lead a normal life due the damage done by the quake but has sincerely helped disaster-hit compatriots and Japanese inhabitants in the area. 
					
					 "I have led a worthwhile life thanks to President Kim Il Sung and Chongryon. So, I will do what I can to help compatriots as well as Japanese neighbors at this time of need." She said this when distributing rice left at her house right after the massive earthquake and relief materials she had received among Mindan-lining compatriots and Japanese neighbors. 
					
					 The Miyagi Prefectural Headquarters of the Emergency Measure Committee provided Japanese inhabitants with foodstuff Chongryon organizations and compatriots in various parts of Japan had prepared with sincerity at Yakiyama secondary school. 
					
					 After the occurrence of the earthquake it distributed among hundreds of Japanese inhabitants near the school meals, including meat soup, rice-balls, Kimchi, milk, etc. prepared with the relief materials sent by organizations of Chongryon and compatriots in various parts of Japan. 
					
					 Expressing thanks to this, Japanese including couple Sigeru Handa and Tomiko Nakano said: "We feel very grateful to Koreans for providing inhabitants in the region with food at this time of need. We have been encouraged by this help." They expressed thanks to Chongryon for its offer of meal. 
					
					 After joining the Koreans in providing meals, Japanese inhabitants said: "It's nice to see Japan and Korea serve us together. Everybody smiles." Young compatriots had this to say: "We are the young people of the Chongryon organization. Let Koreans and Japanese citizens share food and pool efforts to reconstruct Miyagi."
					
					 The compatriots and Japanese inhabitants inspired by the rescue activities of Chongryon are turning out in the work for eradicating the aftermath of the earthquake, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: EU Strengthens Control on Imports of Food and Feed from Japan
articles.content:
EU Strengthens Control on Imports of Food and Feed from Japan
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The European Union decided on Thursday to strengthen control on imports of food and feed from certain regions of Japan for fear of radioactive contamination. The measure would apply to all feed and food originating in or consigned from 12 prefectures of Japan, where production could be affected by the accident at the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant. 
					 All products from these prefectures have to be tested before leaving Japan and will be subject to random testing in EU.

articles.title: Japanese People's Disapproval of Present Regime Grows
articles.content:
Japanese People's Disapproval of Present Regime Grows
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A total of 58.2 percent of Japanese respondents do not approve of the government's handling of the nuclear crisis at the crippled Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant, according to the latest Kyodo News survey released Sunday.

articles.title: Ozawa Chides Government and TEPCO
articles.content:
Ozawa Chides Government and TEPCO 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Ozawa, former representative of the Japan Democratic Party, at a press conference on Mar. 28, bitterly denounced the government and the Tokyo Electric Power Co. for the accident at the nuclear power plant. 
					 He said that concerns were expressed over the meltdown of fuel rods at reactors already long ago but the nuclear security board, TEPCO and the government shunned giving a clarification of them.
					
					 He said that repeating such work as dousing the nuclear power plant with water or opening valves without taking any positive steps may lead to the spread of radioactive substance to larger areas, expanding the contamination. 
					
					 He noted that if things are allowed to go on like now without taking any decisive measures, the whole of Japan will find itself in mayhem.

articles.title: Chinese Helicopter Approaches Japanese Escort Ship
articles.content:
Chinese Helicopter Approaches Japanese Escort Ship 
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A Chinese helicopter approached close to Isoyuki, an escort ship of the Japan Maritime "Self-Defence Force," on guard duty from the air over the waters near the middle line between China and Japan in the East Sea of China on March 26 and disappeared after making a round of it. 
					 The Japanese Mainichi Shimbun on March 27 said this, noting that the copter bore Chinese letters "Zhongguo Haijian."

articles.title: Strengthened Management of Leading Officials Called for in China
articles.content:
Strengthened Management of Leading Officials Called for in China 
						
 Beijing, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China at a meeting held on Mar. 28 discussed the issue of strengthening the management of leading party and administrative officials. 
					 The meeting said that to build up the ranks of leading party and administrative officials with high qualifications is of very weighty significance in enhancing the party's governance, promoting the successful and rapid development of economy and society and ensuring the long-term stability of the party and state. 
					
					 It underlined the need to round off the system of selecting and appointing cadres and intensify the education and training and strengthening the cultivation of the party spirit and the party tempering.

articles.title: China Launches New Round of Inspections of Food
articles.content:
China Launches New Round of Inspections of Food 
 Beijing, March 29 (KCNA) -- China started a new round of national inspections of the enforcement of the Food Safety Law.
					 Wu Bangguo, chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, addressing the recent first plenary session of the inspection groups for the enforcement of the above-said law of the Standing Committee of the CNPC held in Beijing, said that food safety is related to the health of the people and their safety, adding that the inspections are aimed to settle problems in enforcing the above-said law. 
					
					 He asked lawmakers to lead in-depth, comprehensive inspections and to conduct supervision to be sure the State Council, or the Cabinet, and relevant government departments "never slack off in their work in safeguarding food safety so as to let the public rest assured."

articles.title: Improvement of Work Style Urged in China
articles.content:
Improvement of Work Style Urged in China
 Beijing, March 29 (KCNA) -- Wang Shengjun, president of the Supreme People's Court of China, underscored the need to improve the work style during his recent survey and study at people's courts of different levels in Hainan Province.
					 He called on the people's courts at various levels there to improve the quality of trials and consolidate the ranks of their staff members in a bid to achieve the scientific development of their work.
					
					 He also underlined the need to improve the work style on the basis of reality and the issues raised by people so as to strictly enforce laws, fairly deal with cases and share feelings with them.

articles.title: Russia Strengthens Strategic Forces
articles.content:
Russia Strengthens Strategic Forces
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Russia has put spurs to the strengthening of strategic forces.
					 Russia issued a 2011-2020 program for the strengthening of strategic forces and allocated a large amount of money for the project. The amount is three times that of the previous program. 
					
					The Russian prime minister told a recent meeting for the implementation of the new program that the country would double the manufacture of strategic and tactical missiles from 2013. If the program was implemented, the Russian army will be supplied with more than 1,300 varieties of new equipment and weapons and its modern arms will reach 70 percent, he said.
					
					 The Russian government has paid a primary attention to the manufacture of up-to-date missiles to cope with the missile defense system the United States plans to deploy in Europe against Russia's intercontinental ballistic missiles.
					
					 Russia is now developing new kinds of ballistic missile and submarine.

articles.title: Russian Interior Forces to Be Built up
articles.content:
Russian Interior Forces to Be Built up
						
 Moscow, March 29 (KCNA) -- Dmitri Medvedev, president of Russia, expressed the government's stand to bolster the interior forces, on March 27 when speaking at an event held to mark the day of the forces. 
					 The interior forces have fought to ensure territorial integrity of the country, keep the social order and oppose international terrorism, he said, adding that the state would back the forces in every way. 
					
					 It will also do its best to turn the interior force into powerful and combatant ranks, he said.

articles.title: Shelling Exercises by Russian Pacific Sea Fleet
articles.content:
Shelling Exercises by Russian Pacific Sea Fleet
 Moscow, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Russian Pacific Sea Fleet recently staged shelling exercises in Peter the Great Bay of Russia, according to a briefing given by the information bureau of the Fleet on Monday.
					 Involved in the exercises were sailors, large antisubmarine craft, landing craft and missile-carrying craft of the Fleet. 
					
					 Large antisubmarine ships fired shells on ground targets before the whole group of the Fleet destroyed all of them. 
					
					 Also there were training firing on the targets in air and sea by artillery pieces and antiaircraft missile systems. Crewmen improved their action of preventing sabotage with small arms.

articles.title: Raul Castro on Country's Economic Mode
articles.content:
Raul Castro on Country's Economic Mode 
Havana, March 29 (KCNA) -- Raul Castro, president of the Council of State of Cuba, said about the country's economic mode on Mar. 25.
					 Reiterating Cuba "will not return to capitalism and neo-colonialism," he said the updated model will primarily be based on "a planned economy rather than a market economy."

articles.title: Fidel Castro Accuses US Chief Executive of His Remark
articles.content:
Fidel Castro Accuses US Chief Executive of His Remark
Havana, March 29 (KCNA) -- Fidel Castro Ruz, leader of the Cuban revolution, in his recent article titled "Equal Alliance" accused the U.S. chief executive of his remark made while touring Latin American countries. 
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S. chief executive was reported to have said that the view of the U.S. administration on the American Continent is based on the "equal alliance". Referring to this remark, the article noted: In the final analysis, the alliance touted by him was little short of "the alliance for progress" which resulted in the expedition carried out by the mercenary troops of the U.S. imperialists to the Playa Giron of Cuba.
					
					 Former U.S. president Nixon instigated the military bosses of Chile to stage a military coup, forcing President Salvador Allende to die a heroic death and putting thousands of people to torture and killing them. Will the U.S. chief executive apologize to the Chileans for this crime? The article queried.

articles.title: One More Fact about US Troops' Human Rights Abuses Disclosed
articles.content:
One More Fact about US Troops' Human Rights Abuses Disclosed
Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- One more fact bringing to light the true colors of the U.S. troops as a group of human rights abusers was disclosed recently. 
					 A trial of a 22-year old soldier of the U.S. forces stationed in Afghanistan took place in a military base of Washington State on March 23 for his diverse crimes including killing and drug abuse. 
					
					 At the trial he admitted to killing at random innocent Afghans in conspiracy with four other soldiers of the U.S. forces. 
					
					 Three days before the trial, the German weekly magazine Spiegel carried three photographs showing a soldier and the dead bodies of the Afghans killed by him. 
					
					  As a matter of fact, the recently disclosed crime is just a tip of iceberg of the countless killings of innocent Afghan civilians by U.S. soldiers. 
					
					 Some days ago, gun ships of the U.S. air force made indiscriminate air strikes on Kunar Province, Afghanistan, killing nine innocent children.

articles.title: Declaracion del portavoz del grupo de inspeccion del CDN
articles.content:
Declaracion del portavoz del grupo de inspeccion del CDN 
						
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ATCC) -- El portavoz del grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico hoy la siguiente declaracion:
					Ya paso un ano desde cuando ocurrio el incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" en las aguas del Mar Oeste de Corea frente a la isla Paekryong.
					
					Sin embargo, las actuales autoridades y belicistas militares del Sur de Corea, acostumbrados a la confrontacion fratricida y a la desconfianza en los connacionales, siguen recurriendo a la campana anti-RPDC, vinculando el caso de "Cheonan" con esta e imputandole la responsabilidad del canonazo en la isla Yonphyong. 
					
					El grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC ya revelo en dos ocasiones la verdad de los dos casos. 
					
					Poco despues de ocurrido el primer caso, hemos expresado lastima a las victimas tomando en consideracion que aunque ellas eran soldados que nos apuntaban con fusiles, son tambien integrantes de la misma nacion. 
					
					Pero, las actuales autoridades y los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea difundieron el resultado de investigacion carente de fundamentos cientificos y objetivos con el fin de obstaculizar la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y frenar la marcha hacia la paz y prosperidad que anhela toda la nacion coreana. 
					
					En particular, la campana anti-RPDC de ellos, que se torna cada vez mas brutal con motivo del primer aniversario del incidente de "Cheonan", provoca gran indignacion de todos los coreanos por su caracter atroz y cinico. 
					
					Con respecto a esto, el grupo de inspeccion del CDN de la RPDC se ve obligado a exponer una vez mas al interior y al exterior del pais nuestra posicion de principios:
					
					1. Las actuales autoridades y los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea deben dejarse de la locura de vincular el caso de "Cheonan" con la RPDC.
					
					Volvemos a poner en claro que no tenemos nada que ver con el caso de "Cheonan". Este hecho sera invariable aunque pase mucho tiempo. 
					
					Si ellos dan espaldas a esa realidad y vinculan el caso de "Cheonan" con nuestra parte, esto sera la prueba de sus pretensiones de enfrentarse con la connacional RPDC y empeorar las relaciones con ella. 
					
					En el contacto previo para las conversaciones militares de alto nivel Norte-Sur, la parte Sur se retiro primero sin saber controlarse y distorsiono luego la verdad como si la contraparte hubiera hecho esa accion grosera. La parte Sur debe separarse cuanto antes de tal cinismo y dejar de vincular el incidente con nuestra parte. 
					
					Cada vez que ellos empeoren las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas difundiendo el rumor erroneo de que "el Norte esta relacionado con el caso de ´Cheonan´", se aproximaran mas al basurero de la historia. 
					
					El grupo de inspeccion del CDN de la RPDC aclarara hasta el final el secreto del complot dando a la publicidad la tercera y cuarta actas de revelacion. 
					
					2. Las actuales autoridades y los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea no deben intentar imputar por mas tiempo a la parte Norte la responsabilidad del canonazo en la isla Yonphyong. 
					
					Evidentemente dicho, este caso es el otro ignominioso causado por las primeras provocaciones de ellos contra la RPDC. 
					
					Si no hubiera el primer fuego hacia las sagradas aguas jurisdiccionales de nuestra parte, no se habria desatado la batalla de la isla Yonphyong. 
					
					A mas de 60 anos de la division territorial del pais, en el suelo surcoreano y en la zona maritima de su contorno se desarrollaron a menudo los ejercicios de golpe con fuego real contra la RPDC, pero nuestro ejercito nunca habia respondido fisicamente. 
					
					Imputar a la contraparte su responsabilidad de haber abierto primero el fuego deviene un acto antinacional y antipaz que engana a si mismos, a toda la nacion y a todo el mundo. 
					
					Si no desean repetir la afrenta sufrida en la batalla de la isla Yonphyong, deben abandonar con audacia el cinismo de imputar a otro su responsabilidad y tomar la posicion correcta para resolver el problema. 
					
					Mientras ellos hablen de la responsabilidad de alguien por el canonazo en la isla Yonphyong, se tornara cada vez mas firme la decision de nuestra parte de mantener la justa linea de demarcacion militar en el Mar Oeste. 
					
					3. Las actuales autoridades y los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea han de parar su demencial campana anti-RPDC que lanzan pretextando los dos incidentes.
					
					  Ellos deben tener bien presente que la "situacion de emergencia", que esperan con ansia, no se dara en el Norte sino en el Sur de Corea si recurren mas al enfrentamiento y a la guerra psicologica contra la RPDC y fomentan el clima de guerra con ejercicios militares de toda indole.
					
					  Sus alborotos conflictivos con la RPDC justificados con dos incidentes dan lo mismo que una estupidez de recibir golpes de cara en cara y esgrimir punetazos en un callejon sin que lo vea su rival.
					
					  Igualmente, devienen la descabellada accion vendepatria encaminada a atenuar las sospechas de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea sobre los dos incidentes, remediar las cada dia mas graves "discrepancias sur-sur" y defender su erronea politica intransigente sobre el Norte manteniendo la "teoria de principios" hipocritas.
					
					  El grupo de inspeccion del CDN considera como "contar la edad de un nino muerto" la irracional campana de confrontacion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que libran las actuales autoridades y los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea con motivo del primer aniversario del incidente de "Cheonan".
					
					  Deseamos mas que nadie que se alivie la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y se logre la paz a traves del mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas, de modo que ellas den lugar a la paz y la prosperidad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo.
					
					  Por esta razon, hemos propuesto con iniciativa el proyecto de dialogo total y negociaciones y realizamos todos los esfuerzos de buena fe por ponerlo en practica.
					
					  La realidad demuestra que ambas partes estan en estas encrucijadas: el alivio de tension o agravacion de ella y la paz y prosperidad o la guerra.
					
					  El Ejercito Popular de Corea se mantiene en la posicion de dialogar ampliamente si la contraparte lo acepta y hacer una guerra de verdad si el rival la quiere.
					
					  Las actuales autoridades y los belicistas de la capa militar titere del Sur de Corea deben saber que les toca escoger una variante de esa disyuntiva.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion de deportistas ejemplares de la era del Songun
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion de deportistas ejemplares de la era del Songun 
						
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 la reunion de deportistas ejemplares de la era del Songun. 
					Asistieron a la ocasion el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, el vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, Kang Nung Su, y otros funcionarios correspondientes, los jugadores, entrenadores, cientificos e investigadores ejemplares de la rama, y los funcionarios de unidades relacionadas. 
					
					Antes de la reunion, los participantes escucharon la grabacion del discurso del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Mediante la popularizacion del deporte preparemos vigorosamente a todo el pueblo para el trabajo y la defensa nacional", pronunciado el 4 de noviembre del 58 (1969) de la Era Juche en la Conferencia Nacional de Deportistas. 
					
					El foro discutio las tareas y remedios para registrar nuevo avance en el deporte nacional.
					
					El ministro de Deportes Pak Myong Chol presento el informe y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el Dirigente          Kim Jong Il presento la popularizacion y la practica cotidiana del deporte como fundamento de la politica deportiva del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y condujo con dinamismo la labor para llevarlo a cabo. 
					
					Se refirieron a que el Dirigente fijo la ideologia, la tenacidad, la velocidad y la tecnica como 4 elementos del deporte autoctono de Corea y atendio cordialmente la vida de los deportistas. 
					
					Concentraremos nuestras fuerzas en el desarrollo de las disciplinas simbolicas y las con posibilidades de ganar, dijeron y agregaron que deben elevar la atencion social y estatal al futbol. 
					
					Apuntaron que los funcionarios, deportistas y entrenadores deben exaltar a todo el mundo con mucho mas medallas de oro la dignidad y el honor de la Corea del Songun.

articles.title: Phung Quang Thanh aboga por desarrollar relaciones con EPC
articles.content:
Phung Quang Thanh aboga por desarrollar relaciones con EPC
						
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ATCC) -- Phung Quang Thanh, miembro de Buro Politico del Comite Central, subsecretario de la Comision Militar Central, del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, y ministro de Defensa, departio el dia 24 con la delegacion militar del Ejercito Popular de Corea, de visita en su pais.
					En la ocasion, Phung senalo que el partido, el Estado y el ejercito vietnamitas estan agradecidos y no olvidan nunca el fuerte apoyo brindado por el partido, el Estado y el ejercito coreanos a la lucha antiyanqui del pueblo vietnamita por la salvacion nacional.
					
					El Presidente Ho Chi Minh y el Presidente       Kim Il Sung prepararon las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, senalo y continuo que seguira esforzandose por intensificar el intercambio y la cooperacion con el camaraderil y hermano EPC.
					
					Manifesto su conviccion de que bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el pueblo coreano levantara sin falta una gran potencia prospera socialista.

articles.title: Escuela de Agricultura de Pyongyang acoge 30o aniversario de su fundacion
articles.content:
Escuela de Agricultura de Pyongyang acoge 30o aniversario de su fundacion
						
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ATCC) --  La Escuela de Agricultura de Pyongyang de la Universidad       Kim Il Sung acoge el 30o aniversario de su fundacion.
					Al percatarse de la importancia de la formacion del personal competente que contribuya al desarrollo cientifico-tecnico de la agricultura del pais, el Presidente Kim Il Sung hizo fundar ese plantel docente el 28 de marzo del 70 (1981) de la Era Juche. 
					
					El Presidente ilumino la mision y el deber del plantel, fijo personalmente el terreno del nuevo edificio y tomo las medidas para terminar la construccion en un corto plazo.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigio sabiamente las labores de la escuela para que elevara decisivamente la calidad de ensenanza conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo y formara a mucho mas cientifico-tecnicos competentes mediante el fortalecimiento de investigacion cientifica.
					
					Hizo crear nuevas facultades y secciones y envio en varias ocasiones modernos aparatos de experimento e instalaciones, de modo que se fortaleciera la base tecnico-material de la escuela. 
					
					La escuela, que contaba con unos 20 profesores en el momento de su fundacion, se ha convertido bajo el gran amor y confianza de los Grandes Hombres en prestigioso instituto de agricultura con varias facultades, catedras, laboratorios, granjas de practica, curso postgraduado, centro de investigacion, etc.
					
					En el curso de desarrollo, aparecieron nuevas asignaturas, se redactaron los manuales y libros de referencia y se acondiciono la sala de leccion a larga distancia. 
					
					Muchos graduados se hicieron cientificos del Pueblo, Benemeritos, profesores titulares y doctores que contribuyen al desarrollo de la ciencia y tecnica agricolas del pais.

articles.title: Minas de carbon de Corea impulsan la perforacion rapida
articles.content:
Minas de carbon de Corea impulsan la perforacion rapida
						
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ATCC) -- En las minas carboneras a lo largo del pais se dinamiza el movimiento de perforacion de alta velocidad.
					Segun estadisticas, gracias a ese movimiento, fueron preparadas en el mes en curso mas de centenar de galerias de reserva de carbon.
					
					Entre las minas filiales del Complejo Carbonifero de la Zona de Tokchon, como las de Hyongbong y Tokchon, se incrementa el numero de las unidades que han sobrecumplido el plan de produccion del primer trimestre.
					
					Sobre todo, la mina carbonera de Jenam preparo una nueva cuenca carbonifera con yacimiento de millon y cientos de miles de toneladas de ese combustible fosil.
					
					Las minas carboneras de Namdok e Inpho, pertenecientes al Complejo Carbonifero de la Zona de Pukchang, introdujeron el eficiente metodo de dinamitazo que permite aumentar considerablemente el volumen de perforacion diaria.
					
					Tal exito se registra tambien en varias unidades de la mina carbonera juventud de Chonsong del Complejo Carbonifero Juventud de la Zona de Sunchon y las otras en las zonas de Anju, Kangdong, Hamnam y Onsong.
